member.name: T:Emgu.Util.DisposableObject
member.summary: An abstract class that wrap around a disposable object

member.name: F:Emgu.Util.DisposableObject._disposed
member.summary: Track whether Dispose has been called.

member.name: M:Emgu.Util.DisposableObject.Dispose
member.summary: The dispose function that implements IDisposable interface

member.name: M:Emgu.Util.DisposableObject.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.param: If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.

member.name: M:Emgu.Util.DisposableObject.ReleaseManagedResources
member.summary: Release the managed resources. This function will be called during the disposal of the current object. override ride this function if you need to call the Dispose() function on any managed IDisposable object created by the current object

member.name: M:Emgu.Util.DisposableObject.DisposeObject
member.summary: Release the unmanaged resources

member.name: M:Emgu.Util.DisposableObject.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor

member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is true. If the function fails, the return value is false.
